question: In the following scheme of reaction,
<katex>$C_2H_5Cl \xrightarrow{X} C_2H_5F$</katex>
<katex>$C_2H_5Cl \xrightarrow{Y} CH_2=CH_2$</katex>
<katex>$C_2H_5Cl \xrightarrow{Z} C_4H_{10}$</katex>
X, Y and Z respectively are:
choices: HF, aqueous KOH and Na in dry ether
<katex>$Hg_{2}F_{2}$</katex>, alcoholic KOH and Na in dry ether
explanation: Z: Wurtz reaction (Na in dry ether).
